dcterms:creator: Workshop on Machine Translation (WMT) organizers
dcterms:description: A dataset containing parallel English-German sentences used for machine translation evaluation, including newstest-2013 and newstest-2014 as validation and test sets.
dcterms:title: WMTa14 English-German Translation Dataset

dcterms:creator: Workshop on Machine Translation (WMT) organizers
dcterms:description: A monolingual dataset used for pretraining language models, containing 5M sentences from news articles.
dcterms:title: WMT NewsCrawl 2007-2008
